"Nevala N'Ferno" <nevala@wi.rr.com> wrote in message

> "Jeremiah Kristal" <jeremiah@shell.inch.com> wrote in message
> news:3cbdd341$1_1@nntp2.nac.net...
> > Kjorick Stormsoul <kjorick@hotpotatomail.com> wrote:
> > > I have played a bard up to lvl 23 and thoroughly enjoy the class.
> > > Extremely flexible and can solo or group, so far, with ease.
> > > But I keep seeing the word "social" mixed in with descriptions of
> > > being a bard.
> >
> > > True, maybe in what the definition should be of a bard.  However, I
> > > find that, in groups, I am twisting songs during fighting and twisting
> > > regen and mana between fights.  So I rarely get to free my fingers to
> > > say anything.  In fact, because of this, the bard is my most
> > > "unsocial" character.
> >
> > Very, very true.  The level 20 manasong is a fairly new addition, and
> > many, many bards grew up without it.  Getting the level 34 catata so
soon
> > after the level 32 clarity song negated the need for many of us to twist
> > during downtime.
> >
> > > Not a complaint, just an observation.  Maybe when myt dexterity, in
> > > real life, gets to an equivilant of 200 I can play and type at the
> > > same time, but till then I'll be
> >
> > You will
> >
> > learn to type
> >
> > in short bursts
> >
> > to get your
> >
> > point across
> >
> > in-between each
> >
> > song twist.
>
